summary: ICP canister-based QA management app with Motoko backend (authorization/access control) and React + shadcn/ui frontend providing authenticated flows, dashboards, and CRUD pages for bugs, test cases, and test runs.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister with authorization and access control
existing_features.description: Backend implemented in Motoko with authorization mixin and access-control module, integrated in main canister.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration (frontend AuthGate)
existing_features.description: Frontend authentication flow using Internet Identity with AuthGate and LoginButton, actor initialization hooks, and auth-aware routing.

existing_features.title: App shell layout with side navigation
existing_features.description: Core application layout components and navigation structure for major QA sections.

existing_features.title: User profile setup modal
existing_features.description: Modal UI for initial user/profile setup after authentication.

existing_features.title: Dashboard page
existing_features.description: Main dashboard page entry point for the QA app.

existing_features.title: Bug tracking pages (list, detail, create/edit)
existing_features.description: UI pages to view bugs list, inspect bug details, and create/update bug records with status/severity/priority badges.

existing_features.title: Test case management pages (list, detail, create/edit)
existing_features.description: UI pages to manage test cases including list, detail, and create/update flows.

existing_features.title: Test run workflow pages (create, execute, list, summary)
existing_features.description: UI pages supporting test run creation, execution, listing, and summary review.

existing_features.title: System UI states (loading, error, empty states)
existing_features.description: Reusable system components to display loading indicators, error banners, and empty state screens.

existing_features.title: Generated empty-state and branding assets
existing_features.description: Bundled generated PNG assets for empty bugs/testcases states and app logo.

existing_features.title: Frontend-to-backend bindings and actor utilities
existing_features.description: Type declarations and client utilities for calling the backend canister (DID JS/TS bindings, backend.ts, useActor hook).

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP + React app
existing_features.description: Included build-template with Dockerfile, ICP canister YAMLs, deploy script, and frontend tooling configuration for reproducible builds/deployments.

existing_features.title: Deployment documentation and published deployment links
existing_features.description: Added deployment-facing documentation (including a consolidated deployment links file) and tooling to record deployment artifacts for the frontend, supporting shareable hosted app access details.

existing_features.title: Complete a successful Internet Computer mainnet publish/deploy of the existing QA Management app and produce a shareable public website URL for the deployed frontend canister.

Resolve the publish-time domain validation failure by ensuring the deployment/publish flow uses a domain/app name that is 5â€“50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens (e.g., normalize user-provided names by removing spaces and invalid characters).

After a successful mainnet deploy, update `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md` with the latest frontend and backend canister IDs and the generated public website link using the existing `frontend/scripts/recordDeploymentArtifact.js` script (or an equivalent automated step).

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy the QA testing app publicly on ICP and provide a shareable website link

architectural_notes: Backend is implemented as an ICP Motoko canister with modular authorization (MixinAuthorization) and access-control logic.
Frontend uses React + Vite + Tailwind and a large shadcn/ui component set for consistent UI primitives.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity; frontend enforces auth gating and initializes authenticated canister actors for API calls.
Project includes a build-template (Dockerfile + canister.yaml files + deploy script) to standardize build and deployment to ICP.
Project now includes explicit deployment documentation and an artifact-recording script to capture/persist deployment outputs (e.g., URLs/canister IDs) for end-user access.
known_issues: Deployment/publish step encountered a domain name validation error: "Domain QA-testing app by akash must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens."

projectName: Publish QA Management app to IC mainnet and record public link
